ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) carton COLLEGE INN® Chicken Broth
1 (14.5 ounce) can DEL MONTE® Diced Tomatoes with Basil, Garlic & Oregano, No Salt Added
1 (15 ounce) can DEL MONTE Sweet Peas, No Salt Added
title: Minestrone with Roast Chicken
instructions:
Cook onion and garlic in oil in large saucepan, 3 minutes or until tender.
Stir in broth, undrained tomatoes and pasta. Cover and bring to boil; reduce heat. Cover and simmer 8 minutes, or until pasta is tender.
Add chicken and peas; cook 3 minutes or until heated through. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped fresh basil, if desired.
